docs:
TABLE 1 FROM CAR INSURANCE:
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, loss or damage by fire or theft is covered up to the market value at the time of loss or damage.
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, loss or damage by other insured causes including Act Of God, fallen objects, riot, strike, or flood is covered up to the market value at the time of loss or damage.
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, car accessories, including all audio, video, and other standard equipment fitted by the manufacturer or distributor at the time the car was originally purchased, are covered up to $1,000.
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, the excess for car accident repairs is halved if repairs are carried out at an HL Assurance Approved Workshop.
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, windscreen cover is unlimited, with a windscreen excess of $100 unless the windscreen is repaired at an HL Assurance Appointed Windscreen Repairer.
Under the Your Liability to Third Parties coverage, damage to third party property is covered up to S$5,000,000.
Under the Your Liability to Third Parties coverage, death or injury to a third party is covered for an unlimited amount.
Under the You or Your Passengerâ€™s Medical Expenses coverage, medical expenses for the Policyholder, Authorised Driver, and Passengers up to the car's legal seating capacity are covered up to S$1,000 each.
Under the Personal Accident Cover for Injuries in the Car, personal accident benefits are provided up to S$20,000 for the Policyholder, up to S$10,000 for the Authorised Driver, and up to S$10,000 for Passengers.
Under Other Car Insurance Benefits, a daily transport allowance of S$50 a day is provided for up to ten days if repairs exceed three days, up to a total of S$1,000.
Under Other Car Insurance Benefits, towing after an accident is covered up to S$500.
Under Other Car Insurance Benefits, authority to repair for minor repairs is provided up to S$300, with the limit applied after the Policy Excess.
Under Other Car Insurance Benefits, 24-hour Automobile and Medical Assistance Services are available.

Under the insurance policy's Critical Illness Benefit (Section A), the maximum benefit payable for Early Stage and Advanced Stage Critical Illness is 100% of the Sum Insured, with coverage options ranging from S$50,000 to S$300,000.
Additionally, under Section A, the benefit for Angioplasty & Other Invasive Treatment for Coronary Artery is 10% of the Sum Insured, with a maximum payout of S$25,000.
Under the policy's Extra ICU Benefit (Section B), an additional cash benefit is provided for stays in the ICU for 4 or more consecutive days in one admission. The maximum benefit is 20% of the Sum Insured, up to a maximum of S$25,000. This top-up benefit does not reduce the critical illness cover.

The Fraud Protect360 PLUS Gold plan starts from $18.34^ for a monthly premium for a single individual.
The Fraud Protect360 PLUS Platinum plan starts from $29.35^ for a monthly premium for a single individual.
For both the Fraud Protect360 PLUS Gold and Platinum plans, a 10% discount is available on monthly payments when a spouse is included.
For both the Fraud Protect360 PLUS Gold and Platinum plans, a 20% discount is available on yearly payments for a single individual.
For both the Fraud Protect360 PLUS Gold and Platinum plans, a 20% plus an additional 10% OFF* discount is available on yearly payments when a spouse is included.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Online Shopping Fraud coverage is up to $10,000 for both the Gold and Platinum plans.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Fund Transfer Fraud coverage is up to $10,000 for both the Gold and Platinum plans.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Cyber Extortion coverage is up to $10,000 for both the Gold and Platinum plans.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Restoration Costs coverage is up to $10,000 for both the Gold and Platinum plans.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Identity Theft coverage is up to $10,000 for both the Gold and Platinum plans.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Accidental Death and Permanent Total Disablement coverage is up to $100,000 for the Gold plan and up to $200,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Accidental Medical Reimbursement coverage is up to $2,500 for the Gold plan and up to $5,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Hospital Cash Benefit provides $50 for each hospitalised day up to a maximum of 180 days for the Gold plan and $75 for each hospitalised day up to a maximum of 180 days for the Platinum plan.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Hospital Cash Benefit for ICU provides $100 for each hospitalised day up to a maximum of 30 days for the Gold plan and $150 for each hospitalised day up to a maximum of 30 days for the Platinum plan.
Under the Fraud Protect360 PLUS insurance plan, the Emergency Medical Transportation coverage is up to $1,500 for the Gold plan and up to $3,000 for the Platinum plan.

Under the Home insurance policy's Household Contents, Renovation, Fixtures and Fittings coverage, the maximum benefit payable for accidental loss of or damage to the Household Contents is S$100,000 for the Silver plan, S$200,000 for the Gold plan, and S$300,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Household Contents, Renovation, Fixtures and Fittings coverage, the maximum benefit payable for Valuables such as jewellery, watches, and antiques is S$5,000 for the Silver plan, S$5,000 for the Gold plan, and S$5,000 for the Platinum plan, with a per-article limit of S$2,500.
Under the Home insurance policy's additional coverage for Household Contents, the maximum benefit payable for Temporary Storage for up to 30 days is S$15,000 for the Silver plan, S$30,000 for the Gold plan, and S$45,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's additional coverage for Household Contents, the maximum benefit payable for Alternative Accommodation Expenses for up to 30 days is S$15,000 for the Silver plan, S$30,000 for the Gold plan, and S$45,000 for the Platinum plan.
As part of the additional coverage for Alternative Accommodation, the daily limit for family members of 3 or less is S$300 per day for the Silver plan, S$500 per day for the Gold plan, and S$750 per day for the Platinum plan.
As part of the additional coverage for Alternative Accommodation, the daily limit for family members of 4 or more is S$600 per day for the Silver plan, S$1,000 per day for the Gold plan, and S$1,500 per day for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's additional coverage for Household Contents, the maximum benefit payable for Interior Decoration Period or Refurbishment Work for up to 60 days is S$30,000 for the Silver plan, S$60,000 for the Gold plan, and S$90,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's additional coverage for Household Contents, the maximum benefit payable for the Emergency Cash Allowance after 3 days or more is S$1,000 for the Silver plan, S$1,000 for the Gold plan, and S$1,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Loss of Money coverage, the maximum benefit payable against loss of cash from theft is S$1,000 for the Silver plan, S$1,500 for the Gold plan, and S$2,500 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Locks and Keys coverage, the maximum benefit payable for replacement costs due to burglary or robbery is S$1,000 for the Silver plan, S$1,500 for the Gold plan, and S$2,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Deterioration of Frozen Food coverage, the maximum benefit payable for the cost of replacing spoiled food is S$1,000 for the Silver plan, S$1,000 for the Gold plan, and S$1,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Accidental Breakage of Fixed Glass and Mirror coverage, the maximum benefit payable for replacement costs is S$2,000 for the Silver plan, S$3,500 for the Gold plan, and S$5,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Worldwide Personal Liability coverage, the maximum benefit payable against legal liability for accidental property damage or bodily injury is S$500,000 for the Silver plan, S$500,000 for the Gold plan, and S$500,000 for the Platinum plan.
As part of the additional Worldwide Personal Liability coverage, the maximum benefit for Occupier's Liability is S$500,000 for the Silver plan, S$500,000 for the Gold plan, and S$500,000 for the Platinum plan.
As part of the additional Worldwide Personal Liability coverage, the maximum benefit for Visitor's Personal Effects is S$1,000 for the Silver plan, S$1,000 for the Gold plan, and S$1,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Removal of Debris coverage, the maximum benefit payable for the cost of removing debris is S$10,000 for the Silver plan, S$15,000 for the Gold plan, and S$20,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Fire Extinguishing Expenses coverage, the maximum benefit payable for the cost of replenishing fire fighting appliances is S$5,000 for the Silver plan, S$5,000 for the Gold plan, and S$5,000 for the Platinum plan.
Under the Home insurance policy's Family Personal Accident (Worldwide Cover), the maximum benefit payable is S$35,000 for the Silver plan, S$35,000 for the Gold plan, and S$35,000 for the Platinum plan. This includes a limit of S$10,000 per adult and S$3,000 per child.
As part of the additional Family Personal Accident coverage, the maximum benefit for Accidental Medical expenses is S$1,000 per family for the Silver plan, S$1,000 per family for the Gold plan, and S$1,000 per family for the Platinum plan, with a per-person limit of S$300.
Under the Home insurance policy's optional Personal Effects coverage, the maximum benefit payable against accidental loss or damage is S$20,000 for the Silver plan, S$50,000 for the Gold plan, and S$70,000 for the Platinum plan. The per-article limit under this optional coverage is S$5,000 for the Silver plan, S$10,000 for the Gold plan, and S$12,000 for the Platinum plan.
The base Monthly Premium (Before 9% GST) for the Home insurance policy is S$22.23 for the Silver plan, S$38.89 for the Gold plan, and S$54.45 for the Platinum plan.
The Additional Monthly Premium (Before 9% GST) for the optional Personal Effects cover is S$16.67 for the Silver plan, S$42.23 for the Gold plan, and S$58.89 for the Platinum plan.
The Total Monthly Premium (Before 9% GST) including the optional Personal Effects cover is S$38.90 for the Silver plan, S$81.12 for the Gold plan, and S$113.34 for the Platinum plan.

For a Single Hospital insurance plan, a Monthly payment type receives a 0% discount.
For a Single Hospital insurance plan, an Annual payment type receives a 5% discount.
For a Couple Hospital insurance plan, a Monthly payment type receives a 5% discount.
For a Couple Hospital insurance plan, an Annual payment type receives a 10% discount.
Under the Hospital insurance, the Daily Hospital Cash benefit is provided per day for up to 365 days, with a maximum payable amount of S$100 for the Silver plan, S$200 for the Premier plan, and S$300 for the Titanium plan.
Under the Hospital insurance, the Triple Hospital Cash benefit for stays in the Intensive Care Unit (ICU) is provided per day for up to 30 days, with a maximum payable amount of S$300 for the Silver plan, S$600 for the Premier plan, and S$900 for the Titanium plan.
Under the Hospital insurance, the Recuperation Benefit is provided per day for up to 30 days, with a maximum payable amount of S$50 for the Silver plan, S$75 for the Premier plan, and S$100 for the Titanium plan.
Under the Hospital insurance, the Special COVID-19 Benefit has a maximum benefit payable of S$10,000 for the Silver, Premier, and Titanium plans.
Under the Hospital insurance, the Ambulance and Transportation expenses benefit has a maximum benefit payable of S$500 for the Silver, Premier, and Titanium plans.
Under the Hospital insurance, the No Claim Bonus is 20% for the Silver, Premier, and Titanium plans.

MAID PROTECT360 PRO - BENEFITS AND COVERAGE EXTRACTED FROM TABLE

Section 1 - Personal Accident Coverage:
Personal Accident Accidental Death benefit provides sixty thousand dollars for Basic plan, seventy thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, eighty thousand dollars for Premier plan, and one hundred thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Personal Accident Permanent Disablement benefit provides sixty thousand dollars for Basic plan, seventy thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, eighty thousand dollars for Premier plan, and one hundred thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Accidental Medical Reimbursement covers when your helper sustains an injury and requires outpatient medical treatment with benefits of one thousand dollars for Basic plan, two thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, three thousand dollars for Premier plan, and five thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Clinical Visit coverage provides fifty dollars per visit for Basic plan, seventy five dollars per visit for Enhanced plan, one hundred dollars per visit for Premier plan, and two hundred dollars per visit for Exclusive plan.

Dental treatment coverage provides no coverage for Basic plan, 100$ benefit coverage for Enhanced plan, $250 per accident for Premier plan, and four hundred dollars per accident for Exclusive plan.

Ambulance Fee coverage provides no coverage for Basic plan, one hundred dollars per year for Enhanced plan, one hundred dollars per year for Premier plan, and one hundred dollars per year for Exclusive plan.

Treatment by a Chinese Physician provides no coverage for Basic plan, no coverage for Enhanced plan, one hundred dollars per accident for Premier plan, and two hundred dollars per accident for Exclusive plan.

Physiotherapy coverage provides no coverage for Basic plan, no coverage for Enhanced plan, two hundred fifty dollars per year for Premier plan, and three hundred dollars per year for Exclusive plan.

Section 2 - Hospital and Surgical Expenses:
Hospital and Surgical Expenses Annual Limit covers when your helper is hospitalized due to an injury or illness and extends to cover Infectious Diseases with up to ninety days Pre and Post hospitalization or Day Surgery, providing sixty thousand dollars annual limit for Basic plan, sixty thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, eighty thousand dollars for Premier plan, and eighty thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Hospital Cash benefit provides no coverage for Basic plan, twenty dollars per day up to thirty days for Enhanced plan, thirty dollars per day up to thirty days for Premier plan, and fifty dollars per day up to thirty days for Exclusive plan.

Waiver of Co-Payment for Hospital and Surgical Expenses covers the twenty five percent co-payment payable by an employer with coverage provided for Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive plans but not for Basic plan.

Section 3 - Hospital Cash:
Hospital Cash benefit is covered under Section 2 with varying amounts per day up to thirty days depending on the plan selected.

Section 4 - Wages and Levy Reimbursement:
Wages and Levy Reimbursement compensates you for your helper's wages and levy if she is hospitalized due to an injury or illness on a reimbursement basis, providing coverage for Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive plans with forty dollars per day up to thirty days for Enhanced plan, fifty dollars per day up to thirty days for Premier plan, and sixty dollars per day up to thirty days for Exclusive plan.

Section 5 - Alternative Maid Services:
Alternative Maid Services pays for the cost of hiring temporary help if your helper is hospitalized due to an injury or illness on a reimbursement basis, providing no benefit for Basic plan, one hundred dollars per day up to thirty days for Enhanced plan, one hundred fifty dollars per day up to thirty days for Premier plan, and two hundred dollars per day up to thirty days for Exclusive plan.

Section 6 - Replacement Maid Expenses:
Replacement Maid Expenses pays for the actual expenses incurred for the termination and or employment agency's fees incurred for hiring a replacement helper due to injury, illness or death on a reimbursement basis, providing 200$ for Basic plan, three hundred dollars for Enhanced plan, five hundred dollars for Premier plan, and six hundred dollars for Exclusive plan.

Section 7 - Repatriation Expenses:
Repatriation Expenses covers transportation expenses to send your helper back to her country of origin following her permanent disablement or death, providing ten thousand dollars for Basic, Enhanced, Premier plan, and Exclusive plan.

Section 8 - Family Grant:
Family Grant pays a lump sum benefit to the helper's estate following her death which arises out of an injury or illness sustained during the period of insurance, providing no coverage benefit for Basic plan, two thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, three thousand dollars for Premier plan, and five thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Section 9 - Insurance Guarantee Bond:
Insurance Guarantee Bond to Ministry of Manpower provides a letter of guarantee for a five thousand dollar Security Bond that will be issued on your behalf to MOM, with coverage $5000 included for all plans - Basic, Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive.

Section 10 - Liability to Third Parties:
Liability to Third Parties covers for legal liability to third party accidental death, bodily injury or property damage caused by your helper during her employment in Singapore, providing no coverage for Basic plan, three thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, five thousand dollars for Premier plan, and seven thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Section 11 - Maid Personal Belongings:
Maid Personal Belongings pays for the loss or damage to your helper's personal belongings due to fire or theft at your house on a reimbursement basis, providing no coverage for Basic plan, one thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, two thousand dollars for Premier plan, and four thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Section 12 - Home Contents:
Home Contents compensates for loss or damage to your home contents arising out of a fire caused by your helper on a reimbursement basis, providing $5000 coverage for Basic plan, ten thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, fifteen thousand dollars for Premier plan, and thirty thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.

Outpatient Privileges for Helper:
Outpatient Medical provides subsidised consultation fee at panel of clinics with coverage is not included for basic and but included for Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive.

Outpatient Dental Consultation fee at panel of clinics when treatment is done provides waived fees and is included for Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive plans but not explicitly stated for Basic plan.

Subsidised treatment fee at panel of clinics provides waived fees and is included for Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive plans but not explicitly stated for Basic plan.

Premium Rates Information:
Premium rates with GST for aged fifty and below for fourteen months policy are three hundred ninety dollars and forty cents for Basic plan, four hundred twenty eight dollars and eighty cents for Enhanced plan, four hundred forty nine dollars and forty cents for Premier plan, and five hundred thirty two dollars and eighty cents for Exclusive plan.

Premium rates with GST for aged fifty and below for twenty six months policy are five hundred seven dollars for Basic plan, five hundred fifty six dollars and ninety cents for Enhanced plan, five hundred eighty three dollars and sixty cents for Premier plan, and six hundred ninety two dollars for Exclusive plan.

Premium rates with GST for aged fifty one and above for fourteen months policy are one thousand eighty one dollars and sixty cents for Basic plan, one thousand one hundred thirty one dollars and forty cents for Enhanced plan, one thousand one hundred fifty six dollars and fifty cents for Premier plan, and one thousand two hundred thirty nine dollars and ninety cents for Exclusive plan.

Premium rates with GST for aged fifty one and above for twenty six months policy are one thousand four hundred four dollars and seventy cents for Basic plan, one thousand four hundred sixty nine dollars and thirty cents for Enhanced plan, one thousand five hundred one dollars and ninety cents for Premier plan, and one thousand six hundred ten dollars and thirty cents for Exclusive plan.

Optional Coverage Section 13 - Waiver of Counter Indemnity:
Under Add-ons, Waiver of Counter Indemnity with excess two hundred fifty dollars relieves your liability in the event MOM makes a demand for security bond payment, with premium rate of fifty four dollars and fifty cents with GST.

Optional Coverage Section 14 - Enhanced Medical Benefits:
Under Add-ons, Enhanced Medical Benefits Additional Hospital and Surgical Expenses add-on to the annual limit under Section 2 provides ten thousand dollars per year coverage.

Under Add-ons, Enhanced Medical Benefits Critical Illness for Major Cancers, Heart Attack, Stroke, CABP, Kidney Failure provides ten thousand dollars coverage.

Under Add-ons, Enhanced Medical Benefits Mobility Aid Reimbursement for purchase of mobility aid equipment such as wheelchairs and crutches as prescribed by a certified doctor provides five hundred dollars per year coverage on reimbursement basis.

Under Add-ons, Enhanced Medical Benefits Free Medical Tele-Consultation provides three times for Employer and three times for your helper per year.

Under Add-ons, Enhanced Medical Benefits premium rates with GST for aged fifty and below for fourteen months policy is eighty one dollars and eighty cents, and for twenty six months policy is one hundred five dollars and eighty cents.

Under Add-ons, Enhanced Medical Benefits premium rates with GST for aged fifty one and above for fourteen months policy is two hundred thirty nine dollars and eighty cents, and for twenty six months policy is four hundred eleven dollars.

Under Add-ons, Six-Monthly Medical Examination MOM includes Physical Examination and Blood Test VDRL plus Pregnancy only, providing up to two times for fourteen months policy and up to four times for twenty six months policy, with premium rates of fifty four dollars and fifty cents for fourteen months and one hundred nine dollars for twenty six months with GST.

Comprehensive worldwide family protection of from up to $50,000 to up to $350,000
Inpatient and outpatient bill protection of from up to $500 to up to $3,500
Free coverage for children in the family
15% no claims cashback every 12 months
For the Accidental Death and Permanent Total Disablement benefit, the maximum benefit payable per adult is $50,000 for the Bronze plan, $100,000 for Silver, $250,000 for Premier, and $350,000 for Platinum.
For the Accidental Death and Permanent Total Disablement benefit, the maximum benefit payable per child is $10,000 for the Bronze plan, $20,000 for Silver, $50,000 for Premier, and $70,000 for Platinum.
For the Accident Medical Expenses Reimbursement benefit, the maximum benefit payable per adult is $500 for the Bronze plan, $1,000 for Silver, $2,500 for Premier, and $3,500 for Platinum.
For the Accident Medical Expenses Reimbursement benefit, the maximum benefit payable per child is $100 for the Bronze plan, $200 for Silver, $500 for Premier, and $700 for Platinum.
For the Child's Education Grant, the maximum benefit payable is $3,500 for the Bronze plan, $7,000 for Silver, $17,500 for Premier, and $24,500 for Platinum.
For the Parent's Support Grant, the maximum benefit payable is $1,500 for the Bronze plan, $3,000 for Silver, $7,500 for Premier, and $10,500 for Platinum.
The No Claim Bonus is 15% for the Bronze, Silver, Premier, and Platinum plans.
For the Family Cash Relief benefit, the maximum benefit payable per adult is $500 for the Bronze plan, $1,000 for Silver, $2,500 for Premier, and $3,500 for Platinum.
For the Family Cash Relief benefit, the maximum benefit payable per child is $100 for the Bronze plan, $200 for Silver, $500 for Premier, and $700 for Platinum.
The Income Protector benefit is not available for the Bronze and Silver plans, while the total maximum benefit is $6,000 ($1,000 per month) for the Premier plan and $7,500 ($1,250 per month) for the Platinum plan.
The Home Care benefit is not available for the Bronze and Silver plans, while the maximum benefit payable is $2,500 for the Premier plan and $3,500 for the Platinum plan.

TABLE 1 FROM TRAVEL INSURANCE:

TABLE 2 FROM TRAVEL INSURANCE:
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage for Overseas Medical Expenses, the benefit for an Adult (age 70 years and below) is $150,000 for the Basic plan, $250,000 for the Silver plan, $500,000 for the Gold plan, and $750,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage for Overseas Medical Expenses, the benefit for an Adult (age above 70 years) is $50,000 for the Basic plan, $50,000 for the Silver plan, $100,000 for the Gold plan, and $100,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage for Overseas Medical Expenses, the benefit for a Child is $100,000 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Medical Expenses in Singapore benefit for an Adult (age 70 years and below), capped at S$100 per visit where no initial treatment was sought overseas, is $10,000 for the Basic plan, $15,000 for the Silver plan, $20,000 for the Gold plan, and $25,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Medical Expenses in Singapore benefit for an Adult (age above 70 years), capped at S$100 per visit where no initial treatment was sought overseas, is $1,000 for the Basic plan, $1,500 for the Silver plan, $2,500 for the Gold plan, and $5,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Medical Expenses in Singapore benefit for a Child, capped at S$100 per visit where no initial treatment was sought overseas, is $1,000 for the Basic plan, $1,500 for the Silver plan, $2,500 for the Gold plan, and $5,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Compassionate Visit benefit is $3,000 for the Basic plan, $5,000 for the Silver plan, $10,000 for the Gold plan, and $15,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Repatriation of Mortal Remains benefit is Unlimited for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Overseas Funeral Expenses benefit is $1,000 for the Basic plan, $1,500 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $2,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Return of Minor Children benefit is $3,000 for the Basic plan, $5,000 for the Silver plan, $8,000 for the Gold plan, and $10,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Emergency Medical Evacuation benefit is Unlimited for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit provides S$200 for every 24 hours, up to a total of $10,000 for the Basic plan, $15,000 for the Silver plan, $20,000 for the Gold plan, and $25,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Medical And Other Expenses coverage, the Hospital Cash Benefit in Singapore provides S$200 for every 24 hours, up to a total of $600 for the Basic plan, $1,000 for the Silver plan, $1,600 for the Gold plan, and $2,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Personal Accident coverage for Accidental Death & Permanent Disablement, the benefit for an Adult (age 70 years and below) is $200,000 for the Basic plan, $250,000 for the Silver plan, $300,000 for the Gold plan, and $350,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Personal Accident coverage for Accidental Death & Permanent Disablement, the benefit for an Adult (age above 70 years) is $50,000 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Personal Accident coverage for Accidental Death & Permanent Disablement, the benefit for a Child is $50,000 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Personal Accident coverage, the Credit Card Outstanding Balance benefit is $1,000 for the Basic plan, $1,500 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $2,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Personal Accident coverage, the Cash Relief for Death due to Accident benefit is $3,000 for the Basic plan, $4,000 for the Silver plan, $5,000 for the Gold plan, and $6,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Personal Accident coverage, the Child Education Grant is not available for the Basic plan, but is $50,000 for the Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Personal Accident coverage for the Child Education Grant, the benefit per child is not available for the Basic plan, but is $5,000 for the Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Loss of Baggage and Personal Effects benefit is $3,000 for the Basic plan, $5,000 for the Silver plan, $7,000 for the Gold plan, and $8,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Personal Money benefit is $250 for the Basic plan, $250 for the Silver plan, $500 for the Gold plan, and $500 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Personal Documents benefit is $2,000 for the Basic plan, $3,000 for the Silver plan, $4,000 for the Gold plan, and $5,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Emergency Phone Charges benefit is $100 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Delayed Baggage benefit provides $100 for every 6 hours while overseas, up to a total of $800 for the Basic plan, $1,000 for the Silver plan, $1,200 for the Gold plan, and $1,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Delayed Baggage benefit after 6 hours in Singapore is $100 for all plans, and is only payable if no claim for lost or damaged baggage has been accepted under the Loss of Baggage and Personal Effects benefit.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Trip Cancellation benefit is $5,000 for the Basic plan, $7,000 for the Silver plan, $12,000 for the Gold plan, and $15,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Trip Curtailment benefit is $3,000 for the Basic plan, $5,000 for the Silver plan, $8,000 for the Gold plan, and $10,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Travel Delay benefit provides S$100 for every 6 hours, up to a total of $1,000 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Travel Postponement benefit is $500 for the Basic plan, $1,000 for the Silver plan, $1,500 for the Gold plan, and $2,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Travel Misconnections benefit provides S$100 for every 6 hours, up to a total of $200 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Trip Disruption benefit is $500 for the Basic plan, $1,000 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $3,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Flight Overbooked benefit provides S$100 for every 6 hours, up to a total of $100 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Flight Diversion benefit provides S$100 for every 6 hours, up to a total of $1,000 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Hijack of Common Carrier benefit provides S$100 for every 6 hours, up to a total of $500 for the Basic plan, $1,000 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $3,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Kidnap & Hostage benefit provides S$500 for every 6 hours and is not available for the Basic plan, but has a total limit of $2,500 for the Silver plan, $5,000 for the Gold plan, and $7,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Travel Inconvenience coverage, the Insolvency of Travel Agency benefit is not available for the Basic plan, but is $1,000 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $3,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Liability coverage, the Personal Liability benefit is $500,000 for the Basic plan, $500,000 for the Silver plan, $1,000,000 for the Gold plan, and $1,000,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Lifestyle coverage, the Loss of Home Contents due to Burglary benefit is $1,000 for the Basic plan, $1,500 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $2,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Lifestyle coverage, the Golfing "Hole in One" benefit is $150 for the Basic plan, $250 for the Silver plan, $350 for the Gold plan, and $450 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Lifestyle coverage, the Credit Card Protection benefit is not available for the Basic plan, but is $600 for the Silver plan, $1,000 for the Gold plan, and $1,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Lifestyle coverage, the Rental Car Excess benefit is $500 for the Basic plan, $750 for the Silver plan, $1,000 for the Gold plan, and $1,250 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, Overseas Medical Expenses for an Adult (age 70 years and below) are not available for the Basic plan, but are covered up to $50,000 for the Silver plan, $150,000 for the Gold plan, and $200,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, Overseas Medical Expenses for an Adult (age above 70 years) are not available for the Basic plan, but are covered up to $25,000 for the Silver plan, $75,000 for the Gold plan, and $150,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, Overseas Medical Expenses for a Child are not available for the Basic plan, but are covered up to $50,000 for the Silver plan, $150,000 for the Gold plan, and $200,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit due to COVID-19 provides $100 for every 24 hours, is not available for the Basic plan, but has a total limit of $1,000 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $3,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Overseas Quarantine Allowance due to COVID-19 pays $50 for every 24 hours on the Silver plan, $100 on the Gold plan, and $150 on the Platinium plan, up to total limits of $500, $1,000, and $1,500 respectively; it is not available on the Basic plan.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Repatriation of Mortal Remains due to COVID-19 is not available for the Basic plan, but is Unlimited for the Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Emergency Medical Evacuation due to COVID-19 is not available for the Basic plan, but is Unlimited for the Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under Enhanced Travel Inconvenience for COVID-19, the Trip Cancellation benefit is not available for the Basic plan, but is $1,000 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $3,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Enhanced Travel Inconvenience for COVID-19, the Total Limit for Family for Trip Cancellation is not available for the Basic plan, but is $2,500 for the Silver plan, $5,000 for the Gold plan, and $7,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under Enhanced Travel Inconvenience for COVID-19, the Trip Postponement benefit is not available for the Basic plan, but is $750 for the Silver plan, $1,500 for the Gold plan, and $2,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Enhanced Travel Inconvenience for COVID-19, the Total Limit for Family for Trip Postponement is not available for the Basic plan, but is $1,875 for the Silver plan, $3,750 for the Gold plan, and $5,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Enhanced Travel Inconvenience for COVID-19, the Trip Curtailment benefit is not available for the Basic plan, but is $1,000 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $3,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Enhanced Travel Inconvenience for COVID-19, the Total Limit for Family for Trip Curtailment is not available for the Basic plan, but is $2,500 for the Silver plan, $5,000 for the Gold plan, and $7,500 for the Platinium plan.
Under Add-On Coverages for Pre-Existing Medical Conditions, the Overseas Medical Expenses for an Adult (age 70 years and below) is $25,000 for the Basic plan, $50,000 for the Silver plan, $75,000 for the Gold plan, and $100,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Add-On Coverages for Pre-Existing Medical Conditions, the Overseas Medical Expenses for a Child is $10,000 for the Basic plan, $20,000 for the Silver plan, $30,000 for the Gold plan, and $40,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Add-On Coverages for Pre-Existing Medical Conditions, the Emergency Medical Evacuation benefit for an Adult (age 70 years and below) is $10,000 for the Basic plan, $20,000 for the Silver plan, $30,000 for the Gold plan, and $50,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Add-On Coverages for Pre-Existing Medical Conditions, the Emergency Medical Evacuation benefit for a Child is $10,000 for the Basic plan, $20,000 for the Silver plan, $30,000 for the Gold plan, and $50,000 for the Platinium plan.
Under Add-On Coverages, the Flight Delay benefit provides $100 for every 3 hours of delay, up to a total of $1,000 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under Add-On Coverages, Loss of Frequent Flyer Miles is Covered for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
